TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IOrderedDictionary implements class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IDictionary, class System.Collections.IEnumerable
type IOrderedDictionary = interface interface IDictionary interface ICollection interface IEnumerable

summary.span: 表示键/值对的索引集合。

span.span: Represents an indexed collection of key/value pairs.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 与键或索引可以访问元素。 elements can be accessed either with the key or with the index. 每个元素都是键/值对存储在结构。Each element is a key/value pair stored in a structure. 每个对都必须有唯一键不是`null`，但是值可以是`null`和不需要是唯一的。Each pair must have a unique key that is not `null`, but the value can be `null` and does not have to be unique. 接口允许对所包含的键和值进行枚举，但它并不表示任何特定的排序顺序。The interface allows the contained keys and values to be enumerated, but it does not imply any particular sort order. `foreach` C# 语言的语句 (`For Each`在 Visual Basic 中) 返回集合中的元素的类型的对象。The `foreach` statement of the C# language (`For Each` in Visual Basic) returns an object of the type of the elements in the collection. 因为每个元素的是一个键/值对，元素类型不是键的类型或值的类型。Because each element of the is a key/value pair, the element type is not the type of the key or the type of the value. 相反，元素类型是，如下面的示例所示。Instead, the element type is , as the following example shows. [!code-cpp[System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary_Implementation#03](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary_Implementation/cpp/remarks.cpp#03)] [!code-csharp[System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary_Implementation#03](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary_Implementation/cs/remarks.cs#03)] [!code-vb[System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary_Implementation#03](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary_Implementation/vb/remarks.vb#03)] `foreach`语句是允许仅读取，不写入集合的枚举器周围的包装。The `foreach` statement is a wrapper around the enumerator, which allows only reading from, not writing to, the collection. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了一个简单的实现基于类。The following code example demonstrates the implementation of a simple based on the class. 实现将第一个名称存储为键和最后一个名称作为值，并添加了每个第一个名称是唯一的要求。The implemented stores first names as the keys and last names as the values, with the added requirement that each first name is unique. [!code-cpp[System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary_Implementation#00](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary_Implementation/cpp/iordereddictionary.cpp#00)] [!code-csharp[System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary_Implementation#00](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary_Implementation/cs/iordereddictionary.cs#00)] [!code-vb[System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary_Implementation#00](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary_Implementation/vb/iordereddictionary.vb#00)]

span.para: 实现类必须具有对键进行比较的方法。
The implementing class must have a means to compare keys.

summary.span: 返回一个循环访问 集合的枚举数。

span.span: Returns an enumerator that iterates through the collection.
An for the entire collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks [Visual Basic、 C#][Visual Basic, C#] C# 语言的 `foreach` 语句（在 Visual Basic 中为 `for each`）隐藏了枚举数的复杂性。The `foreach` statement of the C# language (`for each` in Visual Basic) hides the complexity of the enumerators. 因此，使用`foreach`建议而不是直接操作枚举器。Therefore, using `foreach` is recommended instead of directly manipulating the enumerator. 枚举器可用于读取集合中的数据，但不能用于修改基础集合。Enumerators can be used to read the data in the collection, but they cannot be used to modify the underlying collection. 最初，枚举数定位在集合中第一个元素的前面。Initially, the enumerator is positioned before the first element in the collection. 也会将枚举器放回此位置。 also brings the enumerator back to this position. 在此位置上，未定义属性。At this position, the property is undefined. 因此，在读取 的值之前，必须调用 将枚举器向前移动到集合的第一个元素。Therefore, you must call to advance the enumerator to the first element of the collection before reading the value of . 在调用 或 之前， 返回同一对象。 returns the same object until either or is called. 将 设置为下一个元素。 sets to the next element. 如果越过集合，枚举器的末尾放置在集合中的最后一个元素的后面和返回`false`。If passes the end of the collection, the enumerator is positioned after the last element in the collection and returns `false`. 当枚举数位于此位置上，对后续调用还返回`false`。When the enumerator is at this position, subsequent calls to also return `false`. 如果最后一次调用到返回`false`，是不确定的。If the last call to returned `false`, is undefined. 若要再次将 设置为集合的第一个元素，可以调用 并接着调用 。To set to the first element of the collection again, you can call followed by . 只要集合保持不变，枚举数就保持有效。An enumerator remains valid as long as the collection remains unchanged. 如果对集合进行更改（如添加、修改或删除元素），则枚举数将失效且不可恢复，而且其行为是不确定的。If changes are made to the collection, such as adding, modifying, or deleting elements, the enumerator is irrecoverably invalidated and its behavior is undefined. 枚举数没有对集合的独占访问权；因此，从头到尾对一个集合进行枚举在本质上不是一个线程安全的过程。The enumerator does not have exclusive access to the collection; therefore, enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure. 若要确保枚举过程中的线程安全性，可以在整个枚举过程中锁定集合。To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can lock the collection during the entire enumeration. 若要允许多个线程访问集合以进行读写操作，则必须实现自己的同步。To allow the collection to be accessed by multiple threads for reading and writing, you must implement your own synchronization. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了一个简单的实现基于类。The following code example demonstrates the implementation of a simple based on the class. 实现将第一个名称存储为键和最后一个名称作为值，并添加了每个第一个名称是唯一的要求。The implemented stores first names as the keys and last names as the values, with the added requirement that each first name is unique. 此代码是为提供一个更大的代码示例的一部分类。This code is part of a larger code example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary_Implementation#01](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary_Implementation/cpp/iordereddictionary.cpp#01)] [!code-csharp[System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary_Implementation#01](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary_Implementation/cs/iordereddictionary.cs#01)] [!code-vb[System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary_Implementation#01](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary_Implementation/vb/iordereddictionary.vb#01)]

MemberSignature.Value: public void Insert (int index, object key, object value);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Insert(int32 index, object key, object value) cil managed
Public Sub Insert (index As Integer, key As Object, value As Object)
public: void Insert(int index, System::Object ^ key, System::Object ^ value);
abstract member Insert : int * obj * obj -> unit

param.name: index
param.span: 键/值对应在从零开始的索引处插入。

span.span: The zero-based index at which the key/value pair should be inserted.

param.name: key
param.span: 用作要添加的元素的键的对象。

span.span: The object to use as the key of the element to add.

param.name: value
param.span: 用作要添加的元素的值的对象。

span.span: The object to use as the value of the element to add.
The value can be .

summary.span: 将键/值对插入到指定索引处的集合中。

span.span: Inserts a key/value pair into the collection at the specified index.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 接受`null`为有效的值，并允许重复元素。 accepts `null` as a valid value and allows duplicate elements. 如果`index`参数等于，则`value`参数添加到末尾集合。If the `index` parameter is equal to , the `value` parameter is added to the end of the collection. 在由连续的元素组成的集合（如列表）中，插入点下面的元素将下移以容纳新的元素。In collections of contiguous elements, such as lists, the elements that follow the insertion point move down to accommodate the new element. 如果集合具有索引，则移动的元素的索引也将更新。If the collection is indexed, the indexes of the elements that are moved are also updated. 此行为不适用于的集合的元素从概念上讲组合在一起，如哈希表。This behavior does not apply to collections where elements are conceptually grouped together, such as a hash table. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了一个简单的实现基于类。The following code example demonstrates the implementation of a simple based on the class. 实现将第一个名称存储为键和最后一个名称作为值，并添加了每个第一个名称是唯一的要求。The implemented stores first names as the keys and last names as the values, with the added requirement that each first name is unique. 此代码是为提供一个更大的代码示例的一部分类。This code is part of a larger code example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary_Implementation#01](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary_Implementation/cpp/iordereddictionary.cpp#01)] [!code-csharp[System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary_Implementation#01](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary_Implementation/cs/iordereddictionary.cs#01)] [!code-vb[System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary_Implementation#01](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary_Implementation/vb/iordereddictionary.vb#01)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 接受`null`为有效的值，并允许重复元素。 accepts `null` as a valid value and allows duplicate elements. C# 语言使用关键字来定义而不是实现索引器属性。The C# language uses the keyword to define the indexers instead of implementing the property. Visual Basic 将 实现为默认属性，该属性提供相同的索引功能。Visual Basic implements as a default property, which provides the same indexing functionality. 此属性，可使用以下语法访问集合中的特定元素：This property allows you to access a specific element in the collection by using the following syntax: [!code-cpp[System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary_Implementation#04](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary_Implementation/cpp/remarks.cpp#04)] [!code-csharp[System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary_Implementation#04](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary_Implementation/cs/remarks.cs#04)] [!code-vb[System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary_Implementation#04](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary_Implementation/vb/remarks.vb#04)] ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了一个简单的实现基于类。The following code example demonstrates the implementation of a simple based on the class. 实现将第一个名称存储为键和最后一个名称作为值，并添加了每个第一个名称是唯一的要求。The implemented stores first names as the keys and last names as the values, with the added requirement that each first name is unique. 此代码是为提供一个更大的代码示例的一部分类。This code is part of a larger code example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary_Implementation#01](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary_Implementation/cpp/iordereddictionary.cpp#01)] [!code-csharp[System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary_Implementation#01](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary_Implementation/cs/iordereddictionary.cs#01)] [!code-vb[System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary_Implementation#01](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary_Implementation/vb/iordereddictionary.vb#01)]

MemberSignature.Value: public void RemoveAt (int index);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void RemoveAt(int32 index) cil managed
Public Sub RemoveAt (index As Integer)
public: void RemoveAt(int index);
abstract member RemoveAt : int -> unit

param.name: index
param.span: 要移除的元素的从零开始的索引。

span.span: The zero-based index of the element to remove.

summary.span: 移除指定索引处的元素。

span.span: Removes the element at the specified index.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在由连续的元素组成的集合（如列表）中，已移除元素下面的元素将上移以占据空出的位置。In collections of contiguous elements, such as lists, the elements that follow the removed element move up to occupy the vacated spot. 如果集合具有索引，则移动的元素的索引也将更新。If the collection is indexed, the indexes of the elements that are moved are also updated. 此行为不适用于的集合的元素从概念上讲组合在一起，如哈希表。This behavior does not apply to collections where elements are conceptually grouped together, such as a hash table. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了一个简单的实现基于类。The following code example demonstrates the implementation of a simple based on the class. 实现将第一个名称存储为键和最后一个名称作为值，并添加了每个第一个名称是唯一的要求。The implemented stores first names as the keys and last names as the values, with the added requirement that each first name is unique. 此代码是为提供一个更大的代码示例的一部分类。This code is part of a larger code example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary_Implementation#01](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary_Implementation/cpp/iordereddictionary.cpp#01)] [!code-csharp[System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary_Implementation#01](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary_Implementation/cs/iordereddictionary.cs#01)] [!code-vb[System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary_Implementation#01](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary_Implementation/vb/iordereddictionary.vb#01)]
